title: So apparently this actually works...
body:
When you evolve Eevee and name it according to the three trainers for Vaporean, Joltean and Flareon and do it before you evolve it, it will evolve to that Pokemon respectively

So here's how it would be:

Sparky = Jolteon
Rainer = Vaporeon
Pyro = Flareon

It worked for me..

http://imgur.com/uOe57Oo
